last_episode_to_air.name: The Sonny and Dot Show
last_episode_to_air.overview: Dot and Sonny are both feeling lonely, so thet stay late at the restaurant to cry on each other's shoulder.

name: It's a Living
overview: It's a Living is an American sitcom set in a restaurant at the top of the Bonaventure Hotel in Los Angeles. The show aired on ABC from October 30, 1980 until June 11, 1982. After the series was cancelled, new episodes aired in first-run syndication from September 28, 1985 to April 8, 1989. The series was created by Stu Silver, Dick Clair and Jenna McMahon, and produced by Witt/Thomas Productions, later in association with Golden West Television and Lorimar-Telepictures.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: The series opens with innocent Vicki contemplating going out on a date with a pilot.  She's even more worried about what's going to happen after the dinner, since she still is a virgin.

episodes.name: The Intruder
episodes.overview: While her husband and children are away on a camping trip, Lois has Jan stay overnight due to the fact that a burglar has been terrorizing her neighborhood.  It turns into a slumber party when Dot and Vicki insist on sleeping over as well but the fun quickly is dampened when the burglar makes an appearance.

episodes.name: Roomies
episodes.overview: Vicki's plans are ruined when tenants change their minds about moving out of an apartment which is to be hers.  This prompts the other waitresses to talk Cassie into putting her up for a few days.

episodes.name: Fallen Idol
episodes.overview: Vicki's father comes to town for a visit and Vicki is worried about his reaction to the skimpy outfits she must wear for work.  However this worry pales in comparison to her discovering her dad and Nancy having a one night stand.

episodes.name: The Lois Affair
episodes.overview: After having a big argument with her husband, Lois runs into her high school sweetheart who wants to pick up where they left off.  When he gives Lois his hotel key, a concerned Dot and Vicki follow her and try to stop her from making what could be the biggest mistake of her life.

episodes.name: Super-Mom
episodes.overview: Jan wants to be able to afford to pay for ballet lessons for her daughter, so she picks up a second job, preparing invitations.  However, her second job begins to interfere with her job at the restaurant which prompts Nancy to fire her.

episodes.name: Cassie's Punctured Romance
episodes.overview: Cassie is reluctant to stay with her latest boyfriend since falling in love is something that she is uncomfortable with.  Meanwhile to impress him, she decides to cook a meal, with a little help from her fellow waitresses.

episodes.name: Up On the Roof
episodes.overview: The staff must stay calm when a fire breaks out in the hotel a few floor below the restaurant.  They must also try to keep the customers as calm as possible which proves difficult at times since the customers include a bickering married couple, a money grubbing televangilist and a man who's having an affair on his wife.

episodes.name: Making the Grade
episodes.overview: Jan makes a mistake when she accepts her economics professor's offer to go out on a date.  However, when she tries to break off their romance, he hands her an ultimatum:  sleep with me or I'll give you an F in the course.

episodes.name: Our Man Barry
episodes.overview: Dot and Vicki begin dating the same man which only aggravates the situation at the restaurant where Nancy imposes a crash diet on Cassie and Jan.

episodes.name: R-E-S-P-E-C-T
episodes.overview: Lois learns that an invitation to speak to her daughter's class about working mothers was prompted by her daughter's essay describing her as vice president of a bank.  Meanwhile, Dot tries to cheer up an impotent Sonny.

episodes.name: Kids
episodes.overview: Jan and Lois have a ongoing debate over the discovery of a girlie magazine in the possesion of Lois's son.

episodes.name: You're Not Old, You're Fired
episodes.overview: Nancy is unexpectedly fired from her hostess position at the restaurant.  Her firing is not the only surprise as is the reason she was fired which forces her to come face to face with age discrimination.

episodes.name: Boys of Summer
episodes.overview: The staff becomes infected with baseball fever, after a baseball team invades the restaurant.

episodes.name: All My Son
episodes.overview: Sonny is surprised when a woman from his past surprises him with news that she's been thinking about him for the past 10 years.  However, he is flabbergasted to learn the reason she been thinking of him, he's the father of her 10-year-old child.

episodes.name: Of Mace and Men
episodes.overview: After Maggie is mugged, the waitress go to lengths to protect themselves and begin carrying mace.  However, after Dot is targeted in the parking garage, she defends herself, but the mugger responds by taking her to court.

episodes.name: The Wedding
episodes.overview: A wedding being held at the restaurant is interrupted when the groom spots an old flame across the room, Cassie.

episodes.name: Second Time Around, Almost
episodes.overview: Jan's ex-husband re-enters her life and fans an old flame in Jan, that she thought went out years ago.

episodes.name: Off the Top
episodes.overview: The entire staff gets disheartening news when it is announced that the restaurant has been sold and will be turned into a fitness center.  This leads everyone to face the reality and depression of unemployment lines, job applications and interviews.  That is except Sonny, who has seemingly been hired at another restaurant.

episodes.name: Mann is Mann
episodes.overview: Sonny's brother, Buddy, flies into town and instantly disrupts Sonny's life when he moves in with him.  Buddy quickly becomes an unwelcome houseguest, one whom Sonny is hesitant to kick out.

episodes.name: Jealousy or Mildred Fierce
episodes.overview: The girls and especially Nancy make strenuous efforts to keep Dennis from falling apart when his wife leaves him.

episodes.name: Young Love
episodes.overview: A romance develops between 33 year old Jan and Maggie's 23 year old brother.

episodes.name: The Garden of Countess Natasha
episodes.overview: Dot's new play opens and the rest of the staff have no good reviews to give her.

episodes.name: Falling in Love Again
episodes.overview: Maggie is consumed with guilt after she begins a romance with a man, who happens to be the first man she's dated since her husband died.  Meanwhile, cops stakeout the restaurant for bandits.

episodes.name: Horsing Around
episodes.overview: Gambling fever strikes after Jan overhears a tip from a jockey eating at the restaurant and her and Maggie begin betting. The others quickly become miffed at not being let in. Later, the jockey returns and Maggie overhears him order the special (number 7) and mistakes that number for the winner of the next race.  All is well as that horse wins.

episodes.name: Strange Bedfellows
episodes.overview: Dot's in the hospital with a relentless cheery roommate while the hotel is swamped with WWII veterans.

episodes.name: A Farewell to Arm
episodes.overview: On the day of the biggest date of her life, Jan literally gets stuck at Maggie's garage sale.

episodes.name: Harassed
episodes.overview: New to the big city, Amy begins receiving a series of threatening messages from a stalker, something she is totally unprepared for after living her life in the country.

episodes.name: Cassie's Cowboy
episodes.overview: Cassie falls in love with a cowboy who is a millionaire and is shocked when she learns she also has to like him to be with him.

episodes.name: Amy Big Girl Now
episodes.overview: Amy gets a surprise visit from her father who has come to California to take his little girl back to Texas and away from her new city life.

episodes.name: Desperate Hours
episodes.overview: Terrorists from a Third World country take the restaurant hostage.

episodes.name: I Write the Songs
episodes.overview: Sonny thinks he has struck gold with a record company and quits his job at the restaurant in a big way.

episodes.name: Jan's Engagment
episodes.overview: Jan hits it off with a fan repair man who whisks her off her feet.  Their relationship goes faster then she expected when he suddenly proposes.

episodes.name: From Russia with Love
episodes.overview: A Russian, while visiting California, defects and locks himself in Cassie's locker, claiming he loves her.

episodes.name: The Prom Show
episodes.overview: A prom is scheduled to take place at the restaurant but when the entertainment doesn't show up, Dot takes over as the entertainment committee.  Meanwhile, Jan has second thoughts about her engagement to Richie.

episodes.name: The Wedding Show
episodes.overview: Jan and Richie's wedding may be postponed when the judge fails to appear and it seems that the honeymoon may be a threesome.

episodes.name: Hail to the Chef
episodes.overview: The President may visit the restaurant and everyone passes the security check, that is except Howard.

episodes.name: Eleven Angry Men and Dot
episodes.overview: Dot serves jury duty and becomes the hold out juror.  Meanwhile, Nancy and the other waitresses must deal with Dot's absence from work.

episodes.name: Gender Gap
episodes.overview: A sex discrimination suit is brought against the restaurant which forces Nancy to hire a obnoxious waiter.

episodes.name: Jealous Wife
episodes.overview: Cassie's one night stand is a dream for her but it turns into a nightmare when she is publicly humiliated by the man's wife in the restaurant.

episodes.name: The Doctor Danny Show
episodes.overview: During a date, Nancy suffers a hernia and when her physician discovers it, he insists that she have it operated on immediately.  However, an old phobia about hospitals surfaces and she flat out refuses treatment.  Meanwhile, Amy tries to get the girls to go in on a shady vacation property venture.

episodes.name: Jewel Heist
episodes.overview: A visiting princess becomes the target of terrorists who plan to make off with her extravagant diamond necklace.  However, Dot accidentally intercepts a drugged napkin intended for the princess.

episodes.name: The Jerks
episodes.overview: The girls are forced to stay late and take inventory.  This leads each girl to tell a story about the worst date they ever had.

episodes.name: Oddest Couple
episodes.overview: Cassie, desperate for a new place to live, temporarily moves in with Sonny, and the rumors fly.

episodes.name: Dot's Puppy
episodes.overview: Dot gets a noisy puppy after her cat dies and Sonny quits rather than miss a date with a roller derby queen.

episodes.name: Dinner with Deedee
episodes.overview: Jan is not looking forward to a visit from an old friend who has always outclassed her in every aspect of life.

episodes.name: Jump
episodes.overview: Cassie questions a man for the reason why he constantly refuses to leave her a tip only to discover he works for the IRS and serves her with an audit.  Meanwhile, Dot's latest boyfriend makes a public appeal for her love, keep seeing him or he will jump from the roof.

episodes.name: America's Sweetheart
episodes.overview: Dot's relationship with a cartoonist makes the papers when he uses her as a model for a new character in his comic strip.

episodes.name: Mann Act
episodes.overview: Sonny contemplates his final days after dating a mobster's moll.  The mobster found out and has made an appointment to visit Sonny.

episodes.name: The Roof Show
episodes.overview: On a night when everyone wants to leave early, the majority of the staff systematically becomes trapped on the roof, leaving Amy, Nancy and Howard to deal with a mob of customers.

episodes.name: The Bar
episodes.overview: Amy is feeling lonely so to pick up her spirits, the girls take her out to a singles bar.  However, each one of the girls encounter a man who is far from Mr. Right.

episodes.name: The Reunion Show
episodes.overview: Newly married Jan is set to attend her high school reunion and is thrilled that she will get to see her old boyfriend, one who still holds a torch for her and her for him.  Meanwhile, Nancy tries a new trick to lure Howard home.

episodes.name: Surprise
episodes.overview: Jan's birthday is coming up but Amy has not such a nice surprise for Jan, after she becomes convinced that Richie is having an affair with Ginger.

episodes.name: Nancy's Sister
episodes.overview: Nancy is not to pleased with a visit from her sister, Gloria, and things don't improve when Nancy becomes convinced that Gloria is trying to take Howard away from her.

episodes.name: Night at the Iguana
episodes.overview: After their car breaks down, while on a trip to Las Vegas, Sonny and the girls check into a hotel.  A hotel that is run by a mysterious man and his unseen mother.

episodes.name: Family Feud
episodes.overview: Divorcees are coming out of the wood work when Dot's mother and Jan's father come for a visit and hit it off.

episodes.name: The Dot and Howard Show
episodes.overview: After going out one evening to a social event, Dot and Howard begin a series of dates that everyone becomes convinced that Dot and Howard's relationship has turned into something other then platonic.

episodes.name: Farewell, My Sonny
episodes.overview: The hotel hosts a murder mystery but things turn surprisingly real when Sonny becomes the prime suspect in a murder.

episodes.name: Critic's Choice
episodes.overview: A long time rival and food critic of Howard's visits the hotel which puts Howard's job and relationship with Nancy in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Richie's Sculpture
episodes.overview: Richie's new sculpture is a smash success and agrees to let it be displayed in the restaurant.  His success crumbles, however, when Jan allows the sculpture to be sold to a tourist, only later Jan learns it isn't his sculpture.

episodes.name: Sonny's Oil (a.k.a.) The Oil Show
episodes.overview: Sonny strikes oil and with the help from a shady investor, tries to convince the girls to go in on an oil investment.

episodes.name: Nancy's Birthday Party
episodes.overview: Nancy drops heavy hints about her upcoming birthday and expects a party to be thrown. Meanwhile, Jan and Richie fight and Sonny pleads to join Dot's car pool.

episodes.name: The Evictables
episodes.overview: Thanks to Jan's advice, Ginger is evicted from her apartment after withholding the rent to force the landlord to repaint it. Ginger then moves in with Amy, who lives in a ""No Men Allowed"" apartment building, but Ginger's love-life soon conflicts with that rule.

episodes.name: Ginger's Baby
episodes.overview: Ginger babysits for a friend who later strands Ginger with the baby who takes him to work.  Meanwhile, Sonny car-sits for a friend, but picks up the wrong the wrong car, one that belongs to a gangster.

episodes.name: Bachelor Party
episodes.overview: Howard's naive niece visits and begins dating Sonny.  Something Howard is determind to put an end to.

episodes.name: Amy's Rusty
episodes.overview: Amy feels guilty for being unwed so she decides to reunite with an old flame.  Meanwhile, Dot sells skin care products.

episodes.name: Dot's Priest
episodes.overview: Dot is slightly unnerved by an old boyfriend who's becoming a priest and is questioning his commitment.

episodes.name: The Dickie Doodle Show
episodes.overview: Jan Murray plays a former children's show host whose fan club dinner clashes with Nancy's meeting with a vice president from the restaurant chain.

episodes.name: The Howie Show
episodes.overview: South Pacific natives arrive to worship the person they consider a supreme being, Howard.  Meanwhile, Nancy challenges the waitresses to a contest.

episodes.name: The Dot Quits Show
episodes.overview: Dot quits to become a full-time unemployed actress.  Meanwhile, Sonny writes a musical based on Attila the Hun and Ginger's footwear fetish spreads to Amy.

episodes.name: The Two Guys Show
episodes.overview: Ginger weighs the merits of two boyfriends while Howard weighs offers from other restaurants.

episodes.name: A Romantic Comedy
episodes.overview: A romantic evening alone in the hotel is anything but for Jan and Richie, who weather interruptions from the restaurant staff.

episodes.name: Manhandling
episodes.overview: Fur flies after Ginger buys Jan's car and Amy asks Dot to act as a go-between with a handsome new employee.

episodes.name: Nancy's Shrink
episodes.overview: Nancy reviews her relationships with her employees during a visit to her psychiatrist.

episodes.name: Till Death Do Us Part
episodes.overview: Sonny's in love and plans to marry if his fiancee can get to the church on time.  Meanwhile, Howard prepares for a visit from his high-school sweetheart.

episodes.name: Her Back to the Future
episodes.overview: As the staff prepares for a wedding reception, Nancy dozes off and has a bizarre dream about her own marriage, ten years in the future to Sonny.

episodes.name: No, My Darling Daughter
episodes.overview: When Ellen, Jan's daughter, has a date with a senior, all the waitresses worry.  Meanwhile, Howard asks Nancy for $900 to pay back a loan shark.

episodes.name: Sweet Charity
episodes.overview: Dot's in charge of a children's play ""Little Red Riding Hood"" but when the cast is quarentined with the chicken pox, the restaurant staff is asked to fill the roles.

episodes.name: Killing of Sister Dot
episodes.overview: Dot is thrilled about her new part on a soap opera until she realizes her character is in imminent danger of being killed off.

episodes.name: The Date Show
episodes.overview: Nancy has just the solution to Howard's mid-life crisis: she invites him to a square dance, and she won't take no for an answer.

episodes.name: Search and Strike
episodes.overview: Nancy is having a bad week: hotel management wants her to search the waitresses' lockers, and Howard wants her to back off.

episodes.name: The Vegas Show (1)
episodes.overview: When singer Jack Jones checks into the hotel for a few days, he strikes up a friendship with Nancy and invites her to Las Vegas for a long weekend.

episodes.name: The Vegas Show (2)
episodes.overview: When a jealous Howard follows Nancy to Las Vegas, he's horrified to find her gambling at a blackjack table with a lounge lizard named Chick.

episodes.name: The Sonny's Mother Show
episodes.overview: Sonny's dreading an impending visit from his mother: she's never forgivin him for becoming a lounge singer instead of a classical pianist.

episodes.name: Strictly Personal
episodes.overview: Dot doesn't get quite the response she had hoped for after placing an ad in the personals column.

episodes.name: A Pen Pal for Your Thoughts
episodes.overview: The prison pen pal whom Amy has been writing too has surprising news for her, he's getting out of prison.  The even bigger news is that he wants to spend the rest of his life with her.

episodes.name: Twelve Angry Women
episodes.overview: Sonny manages to infuriate an entire table of feminists while Dot starts dating one of Amy's ex-boyfriends.

episodes.name: Skin Deep
episodes.overview: After seeing Howard flirting with a much younger woman, Nancy begins considering having a face lift.

episodes.name: Everyone's a Critic
episodes.overview: Dot has a monumental case of jitters on the opening night of her new play on account of her journalist boyfriend is assigned to review her performance.

episodes.name: Take Back Your Mink
episodes.overview: Richie hits the big money which lands Jan in a mink coat.  However, is his sudden success short lived?

episodes.name: The One About the Tattooed Lady
episodes.overview: Nancy's cousin, Grace, stops by for a visit but that's not the only surprise for Nancy, her cousin is covered from head to toe in tatoos.

episodes.name: Daddy's Little Girl
episodes.overview: Jan has hopes of reuniting her divorced parents but there is one hitch in her plan, her father is newly engaged.

episodes.name: Ginger's Grandmother Show
episodes.overview: Ginger's grandmother shows up on Ginger's doorstep, complaining that her son won't let her drive anymore.  Meanwhile, Sonny decides to make a music video in the restaurant.

episodes.name: Dot's Hope
episodes.overview: When Dot's friend comes to Hollywood  seeking fame and fortune, Dot gets her a job in the restaurant washing dishes.

episodes.name: The Amy and Louie Show
episodes.overview: Sonny sees red when Amy finally agrees to go on a date, but not with him but with his friend Louie.  Meanwhile, Ginger is dreading her blind date with an egg salesman named Wilbur.

episodes.name: Ginger and the Senator
episodes.overview: Ginger's efforts to campaign for her favorite senator makes front-page news when she's photographed sitting on his lap.

episodes.name: Healings, Nothing More Than Healings
episodes.overview: Sonny becomes an instant hero after saving a choking victim by administering the Heimlich maneuver.  Meanwhile, Nancy and Howard contemplate taking seperate vacations.

episodes.name: The No Guys Show
episodes.overview: Ginger's in quandry: her perfect boyfriend wants to tie the knot, but she's not ready to settle down.

episodes.name: The Waiting Game
episodes.overview: The waitresses wax philosophic when a journalist interviews them about the pros and cons of their careers.

episodes.name: Tune In, Tune Out
episodes.overview: Jan feels that her relationship with Richie is in a rut, so to spice it up, she borrows a blond wig from Dot.  However, the results are not exactly what she intended.  Meanwhile, a TV is installed in the lounge.

episodes.name: Pistol Packin' Mama
episodes.overview: Roomates, Ginger and Amy, may be no more after Ginger discovers Amy keeps a gun, something Ginger refuses to have in the apartment.

episodes.name: The Nancy and Roscoe Show
episodes.overview: Nancy and Howard's marriage is put to the test when Nancy falls for Howard's old navy buddy.

episodes.name: The Jan's Pregnant Show
episodes.overview: Richie's aspiration to move to North Dakota is put to a halt by Jan who announces she's pregnant.

episodes.name: Never Trust Anyone Under 40
episodes.overview: Louie throws Sonny a surprise 40th birthday party that ages Howard a few years.

episodes.name: The New Guy Show
episodes.overview: Ginger encounters the unexpected when she telephones a wedding photographer for a date.  Meanwhile, Sonny's agent buys him an hour's worth of TV time.

episodes.name: Rear Window
episodes.overview: Dot's habit of neighbor watching entangles her in what appears to be a woman's murder.

episodes.name: You Do Voodoo
episodes.overview: Jan tries to ward off a developer's plans to build a mini-mall in her neighborhood and Ginger uses a book of voodoo spells to conjure up a perfect date.

episodes.name: The Amy and Bobby Show
episodes.overview: Amy dates a man who wants to take her on the road to salvation.  Meanwhile, Howard unknowingly buys Nancy some hot merchandise.

episodes.name: Dot Casts Off
episodes.overview: Dot accepts a job as a casting assistant and has a difficult task of auditioning a friend.

episodes.name: A Very Scary It's a Living
episodes.overview: Dot has been cast in a slasher movie and she studies up by watching a batch of slasher films.  This leads her to have a scary dream that takes place at the restaurant.

episodes.name: The Ginger's Mother Show
episodes.overview: Ginger's successful career oriented mother comes for a visit and Ginger is reluctant to discuss her career as a waitress with her.

episodes.name: Mike Fright
episodes.overview: Sonny feels threatened when a temporary replacement turns out to be a success.

episodes.name: He Never Sang for His Father
episodes.overview: Sonny is ecstatic when his sexy hairdresser agrees to move in with him.  However, getting to first base gets a bit hard when his father shows up for a visit.  Meanwhile, Jan discovers that someone in her home has been dialing 900 numbers.

episodes.name: Just Say Yes
episodes.overview: Amy anguishes over what she should do with her Valentine's Day present from Bobby Lee, the key to his hotel room.

episodes.name: Wedding, Wedding
episodes.overview: Amy and Ginger decide to have a double wedding at the restaurant.

episodes.name: The Dark at the Top of the Top
episodes.overview: Nancy is in favor of the new hotel manager's ideas that is until she's replaced with Dot.

episodes.name: My Little Red Book
episodes.overview: Sonny finds a little black book that leads him to intrigue and a red-hot lady.

episodes.name: Matchmaker, Matchmaker
episodes.overview: Phil sets Sonny up with a new singing partner while Dot employs a marriage broker.

episodes.name: A Very Special It's a Living
episodes.overview: Jan goes into premature labor and with her life and the baby's life in danger, she has a dream about being visited by a strange Angel of Death.

episodes.name: The Sonny and Dot Show
episodes.overview: Dot and Sonny are both feeling lonely, so thet stay late at the restaurant to cry on each other's shoulder.
